entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
